title: Two Girls for his Birthday
description: After so graciously sharing her with their Italian friend, Marcello, this time Emily plans a surprise for her husband Luke's birthday. He is bummed that he has to spend his birthday working, but Emily has a way to cheer him up. And it isn't the run of the mill birthday night.No, this is definitely what he least expected. His wife has another girl come over. A hot Asian girl!*** Warning: Contains Explicit Sexual Content. HOT FMF Scene. Intended Only for Readers over the Age of Eighteen Years!
author: Anastasia  Rose
